name: UrlBuilder_buildStreamUrlTest
description: Unit tests for the buildStreamUrl method in the UrlBuilder class.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWithoutStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the buildStreamUrl method when no streams are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWithStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the buildStreamUrl method when streams are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWithEmptyStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the buildStreamUrl method when empty streams are provided.
